verses.verse: וַיְהִ֧י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> Moreover the word יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶֽל־ <WH413> to יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <WH3414> came unto Jeremiah שֵׁנִ֑ית <WH8145> the second וְהוּא֙ <WH1931> he עוֹדֶ֣נּוּ <WH5750> was still עָצ֔וּר <WH6113> time while he was yet shut up בַּחֲצַ֥ר <WH2691> in the court הַמַּטָּרָ֖ה <WH4307> of the prison לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֥ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD עֹשָׂ֑הּ <WH6213> the maker יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> thereof the LORD יוֹצֵ֥ר <WH3335> that formed אוֹתָ֛הּ <WH853> לַהֲכִינָ֖הּ <WH3559> it to establish יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> it the LORD שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <WH8034> [is] his name

קְרָ֥א <WH7121> Call אֵלַ֖י <WH413> to me וְאֶעֱנֶ֑ךָּ <WH6030> unto me and I will answer וְאַגִּ֧ידָה <WH5046> thee and shew לְּךָ֛ גְּדֹל֥וֹת <WH1419> thee great וּבְצֻר֖וֹת <WH1219> and mighty things לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יְדַעְתָּֽם׃ <WH3045> which thou knowest ס

כִּי֩ <WH3588> For כֹ֨ה <WH3541> thus אָמַ֤ר <WH559> For thus saith יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel עַל־ <WH5921> concerning בָּתֵּי֙ <WH1004> concerning the houses הָעִ֣יר <WH5892> of this city הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> likewise וְעַל־ <WH5921> and concerning בָּתֵּ֖י <WH1004> and concerning the houses מַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> of the kings יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah הַנְּתֻצִ֕ים <WH5422> which are thrown down אֶל־ <WH413> against הַסֹּלְל֖וֹת <WH5550> by the mounts וְאֶל־ <WH413> and against הֶחָֽרֶב׃ <WH2719> and by the sword

בָּאִ֗ים <WH935> They come לְהִלָּחֵם֙ <WH3898> to fight אֶת־ <WH854> with הַכַּשְׂדִּ֔ים <WH3778> with the Chaldeans וּלְמַלְאָם֙ <WH4390> but [it is] to fill אֶת־ <WH854> with פִּגְרֵ֣י <WH6297> them with the dead bodies הָאָדָ֔ם <WH120> of men אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom הִכֵּ֥יתִי <WH5221> whom I have slain בְאַפִּ֖י <WH639> in mine anger וּבַחֲמָתִ֑י <WH2534> and in my fury וַאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> whom הִסְתַּ֤רְתִּי <WH5641> I have hid פָנַי֙ <WH6440> my face מֵהָעִ֣יר <WH5892> from this city הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> likewise עַ֖ל <WH5921> because כָּל־ <WH3605> of all רָעָתָֽם׃ <WH7451> and for all whose wickedness

הִנְנִ֧י <WH2005> behold מַעֲלֶה־ <WH5927> Behold I will bring לָּ֛הּ אֲרֻכָ֥ה <WH724> it health וּמַרְפֵּ֖א <WH4832> and cure וּרְפָאתִ֑ים <WH7495> and I will cure וְגִלֵּיתִ֣י <WH1540> them and will reveal לָהֶ֔ם <WH1992> to them עֲתֶ֥רֶת <WH6283> unto them the abundance שָׁל֖וֹם <WH7965> of peace וֶאֱמֶֽת׃ <WH571> and truth

וַהֲשִֽׁבֹתִי֙ <WH7725> to return אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁב֣וּת <WH7622> And I will cause the captivity יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> שְׁב֣וּת <WH7622> and the captivity יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וּבְנִתִ֖ים <WH1129> and will build כְּבָרִֽאשֹׁנָֽה׃ <WH7223> them as at the first

וְטִ֣הַרְתִּ֔ים <WH2891> And I will cleanse מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all עֲוֹנָ֖ם <WH5771> them from all their iniquity אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which חָֽטְאוּ־ <WH2398> whereby they have sinned לִ֑י וְסָלַחְתִּ֗י <WH5545> against me and I will pardon [לְכֹול־ כ] (לְכָל־ <WH3605> all עֲוֹנֽוֹתֵיהֶם֙ <WH3605> all ק) אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which חָֽטְאוּ־ <WH2398> whereby they have sinned לִ֔י וַאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which פָּ֥שְׁעוּ <WH6586> and whereby they have transgressed בִֽי׃

וְהָ֣יְתָה <WH1961> become לִּ֗י לְשֵׁ֤ם <WH8034> And it shall be to me a name שָׂשׂוֹן֙ <WH8342> of joy לִתְהִלָּ֣ה <WH8416> a praise וּלְתִפְאֶ֔רֶת <WH8597> and an honour לְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all גּוֹיֵ֣י <WH1471> before all the nations הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the earth אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which יִשְׁמְע֜וּ <WH8085> which shall hear אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> of all הַטּוֹבָ֗ה <WH2896> all the good אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which אָֽנֹכִי֙ <WH595> I עֹשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> that I do אֹתָ֔ם <WH853> וּפָחֲד֣וּ <WH6342> unto them and they shall fear וְרָֽגְז֗וּ <WH7264> and tremble עַ֤ל <WH5921> because כָּל־ <WH3605> of all הַטּוֹבָה֙ <WH2896> for all the goodness וְעַ֣ל <WH5921> because כָּל־ <WH3605> and all הַשָּׁל֔וֹם <WH7965> and for all the prosperity אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which אָֽנֹכִ֖י <WH595> I עֹ֥שֶׂה <WH6213> that I procure לָּֽהּ׃ ס

כֹּ֣ה ׀ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD עוֹד֮ <WH5750> Yet יִשָּׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> Again there shall be heard בַּמָּקוֹם־ <WH4725> in this place הַזֶּה֒ <WH2088> this אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> of which אַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> you אֹֽמְרִ֔ים <WH559> which ye say חָרֵ֣ב <WH2720> [shall be] desolate ה֔וּא <WH1931> he מֵאֵ֥ין <WH369> without אָדָ֖ם <WH120> without man וּמֵאֵ֣ין <WH369> and without בְּהֵמָ֑ה <WH929> and without beast בְּעָרֵ֤י <WH5892> [even] in the cities יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> of Judah וּבְחֻצ֣וֹת <WH2351> and in the streets יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem הַֽנְשַׁמּ֗וֹת <WH8074> that are desolate מֵאֵ֥ין <WH369> without אָדָ֛ם <WH120> without man וּמֵאֵ֥ין <WH369> and without יוֹשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> and without inhabitant וּמֵאֵ֥ין <WH369> and without בְּהֵמָֽה׃ <WH929> and without beast

ק֣וֹל <WH6963> The voice שָׂשׂ֞וֹן <WH8342> of joy וְק֣וֹל <WH6963> and the voice שִׂמְחָ֗ה <WH8057> of gladness ק֣וֹל <WH6963> the voice חָתָן֮ <WH2860> of the bridegroom וְק֣וֹל <WH6963> and the voice כַּלָּה֒ <WH3618> of the bride ק֣וֹל <WH6963> the voice אֹמְרִ֡ים <WH559> of them that shall say הוֹדוּ֩ <WH3034> Praise אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֜וֹת <WH6635> of hosts כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for ט֤וֹב <WH2896> [is] good יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> for the LORD כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּ֔וֹ <WH2617> for his mercy מְבִאִ֥ים <WH935> [and] of them that shall bring תּוֹדָ֖ה <WH8426> the sacrifice of praise בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> into the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אָשִׁ֧יב <WH7725> For I will cause to return אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁבוּת־ <WH7622> the captivity הָאָ֛רֶץ <WH776> of the land כְּבָרִאשֹׁנָ֖ה <WH7223> as at the first אָמַ֥ר <WH559> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD ס

כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֮ <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָאוֹת֒ <WH6635> of hosts ע֞וֹד <WH5750> will again יִֽהְיֶ֣ה ׀ <WH1961> become בַּמָּק֣וֹם <WH4725> Again in this place הַזֶּ֗ה <WH2088> this הֶחָרֵ֛ב <WH2720> which is desolate מֵֽאֵין־ <WH369> else אָדָ֥ם <WH120> without man וְעַד־ <WH5704> or בְּהֵמָ֖ה <WH929> and without beast וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> all עָרָ֑יו <WH5892> and in all the cities נְוֵ֣ה <WH5116> thereof shall be an habitation רֹעִ֔ים <WH7462> of shepherds מַרְבִּצִ֖ים <WH7257> to lie down צֹֽאן׃ <WH6629> causing [their] flocks

בְּעָרֵ֨י <WH5892> In the cities הָהָ֜ר <WH2022> of the mountains בְּעָרֵ֤י <WH5892> in the cities הַשְּׁפֵלָה֙ <WH8219> of the vale וּבְעָרֵ֣י <WH5892> and in the cities הַנֶּ֔גֶב <WH5045> of the south וּבְאֶ֧רֶץ <WH776> and in the land בִּנְיָמִ֛ן <WH1144> of Benjamin וּבִסְבִיבֵ֥י <WH5439> and in the places about יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> Jerusalem וּבְעָרֵ֣י <WH5892> and in the cities יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah עֹ֣ד <WH5750> will again תַּעֲבֹ֧רְנָה <WH5674> pass again הַצֹּ֛אן <WH6629> shall the flocks עַל־ <WH5921> under יְדֵ֥י <WH3027> under the hands מוֹנֶ֖ה <WH4487> of him that telleth אָמַ֥ר <WH559> [them] saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD ס

הִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> Behold יָמִ֥ים <WH3117> Behold the days בָּאִ֖ים <WH935> come נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וַהֲקִֽמֹתִי֙ <WH6965> that I will perform אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> thing הַטּ֔וֹב <WH2896> that good אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which דִּבַּ֛רְתִּי <WH1696> which I have promised אֶל־ <WH413> concerning בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> unto the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel וְעַל־ <WH5921> and בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> and to the house יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> of Judah

בַּיָּמִ֤ים <WH3117> In those days הָהֵם֙ <WH1992> those וּבָעֵ֣ת <WH6256> and at that time הַהִ֔יא <WH1931> he אַצְמִ֥יחַ <WH6779> to grow up לְדָוִ֖ד <WH1732> unto David צֶ֣מַח <WH6780> will I cause the Branch צְדָקָ֑ה <WH6666> of righteousness וְעָשָׂ֛ה <WH6213> and he shall execute מִשְׁפָּ֥ט <WH4941> judgment וּצְדָקָ֖ה <WH6666> and righteousness בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> in the land

בַּיָּמִ֤ים <WH3117> In those days הָהֵם֙ <WH1992> those תִּוָּשַׁ֣ע <WH3467> be saved יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> shall Judah וִירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> and Jerusalem תִּשְׁכּ֣וֹן <WH7931> shall dwell לָבֶ֑טַח <WH983> safely וְזֶ֥ה <WH2088> and this אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יִקְרָא־ <WH7121> and this [is the name] wherewith she shall be called לָ֖הּ יְהוָ֥ה ׀ <WH3068> the LORD צִדְקֵֽנוּ׃ <WH6664> prosperity ס

כִּי־ <WH3588> For כֹ֖ה <WH3541> thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> For thus saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD לֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall never יִכָּרֵ֣ת <WH3772> want לְדָוִ֔ד <WH1732> David אִ֕ישׁ <WH376> a man יֹשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> to sit עַל־ <WH5921> on כִּסֵּ֥א <WH3678> upon the throne בֵֽית־ <WH1004> of the house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וְלַכֹּהֲנִים֙ <WH3548> Neither shall the priests הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> the Levites לֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall never יִכָּרֵ֥ת <WH3772> want אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> a man מִלְּפָנָ֑י <WH6440> before מַעֲלֶ֨ה <WH5927> me to offer עוֹלָ֜ה <WH5930> burnt offerings וּמַקְטִ֥יר <WH6999> and to kindle מִנְחָ֛ה <WH4503> meat offerings וְעֹֽשֶׂה־ <WH6213> and to do זֶּ֖בַח <WH2077> sacrifice כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner הַיָּמִֽים׃ <WH3117> continually ס
וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> came דְּבַר־ <WH1697> And the word יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶֽל־ <WH413> to יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <WH3414> came unto Jeremiah לֵאמֽוֹר׃ <WH559> saying

כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD אִם־ <WH518> If תָּפֵ֙רוּ֙ <WH6565> If ye can break אֶת־ <WH853> בְּרִיתִ֣י <WH1285> my covenant הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> of the day וְאֶת־ <WH853> בְּרִיתִ֖י <WH1285> and my covenant הַלָּ֑יְלָה <WH3915> of the night וּלְבִלְתִּ֛י <WH1115> because הֱי֥וֹת <WH1961> become יֽוֹמָם־ <WH3119> and that there should not be day וָלַ֖יְלָה <WH3915> and night בְּעִתָּֽם׃ <WH6256> in their season

גַּם־ <WH1571> may also בְּרִיתִ֤י <WH1285> [Then] may also my covenant תֻפַר֙ <WH6565> be broken אֶת־ <WH854> with דָּוִ֣ד <WH1732> with David עַבְדִּ֔י <WH5650> my servant מִהְיֽוֹת־ <WH1961> have ל֥וֹ בֵ֖ן <WH1121> that he should not have a son מֹלֵ֣ךְ <WH4427> to reign עַל־ <WH5921> on כִּסְא֑וֹ <WH3678> upon his throne וְאֶת־ <WH854> and with הַלְוִיִּ֥ם <WH3881> and with the Levites הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <WH3548> the priests מְשָׁרְתָֽי׃ <WH8334> my ministers

אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> after לֹֽא־ <WH3808> cannot יִסָּפֵר֙ <WH5608> cannot be numbered צְבָ֣א <WH6635> As the host הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> of heaven וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> cannot יִמַּ֖ד <WH4058> measured ח֣וֹל <WH2344> neither the sand הַיָּ֑ם <WH3220> of the sea כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> so אַרְבֶּ֗ה <WH7235> so will I multiply אֶת־ <WH853> זֶ֙רַע֙ <WH2233> the seed דָּוִ֣ד <WH1732> of David עַבְדִּ֔י <WH5650> my servant וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַלְוִיִּ֖ם <WH3881> and the Levites מְשָׁרְתֵ֥י <WH8334> that minister אֹתִֽי׃ <WH853> ס
וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> came דְּבַר־ <WH1697> Moreover the word יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶֽל־ <WH413> to יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <WH3414> came to Jeremiah לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying
